p: The reduced adipocyte volume observed in the HFD+GbE rats may be associated with their lowered food intake; however, we do not believe these findings suggest starvation. Calorie restriction has been associated with starvation signals such as reduced leptin and insulin ( 44), but in the opposite direction, we have previously found increased insulin levels and activity in obese rats supplemented with GbE submitted to the same experimental protocol ( 26).
